steps.title: Get Your MetaMask Address
steps.description: Copy your MetaMask wallet address and set it as PAYEE_ADDRESS

steps.title: Get RPC URLs from Alchemy
steps.description: Sign up at alchemy.com, create projects for Ethereum and Polygon, copy the HTTPS URLs

steps.title: Test on Polygon First
steps.description: Start with Polygon for low fees. Send a small USDC amount to test detection

steps.title: Set Up Webhook Endpoint
steps.description: Create a simple endpoint at /webhook/delivery to receive payment notifications

steps.title: Run the Watcher
steps.description: Start the payment watcher: npm run watch-payments
